Grace Salome Kwami (1923), bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe na onye nkuzi.
A mụrụ Kwami na 1923 na Worawora, obodo dị na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana (Gold Coast n'oge ahụ). Ọ debara aha ya na Basel Mission's Women Teachers' Training College na Agogo
Ọ gara n'ihu na Kumasi College of Arts (nke bụzi Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology) n'afọ 1951, ebe ọ gụrụ nka.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah, National Museum were ya n'ọrụ ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe site na 1954 ruo 1957
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Mawuli School na Tamale Teachers' Training College site n'afọ 1957 ruo afọ 1978.
Nkà Kwami bụ n'ihe ọkpụkpụ, eserese na ọla
A na-edozi ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ma gosipụta ya na National Museum of Ghana, Volta Regional Museum, na Ghana Museums and Monument Board.
Ọ bụ nne onye na-ese ihe Atta Kwami. Ọ nwụrụ na 2006.
